com.att.android.arodatacollector.main
Class AROCollectorTaskManagerDetailProcess

java.lang.Object
  com.att.android.arodatacollector.main.AROCollectorTaskManagerDetailProcess
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>
public class AROCollectorTaskManagerDetailProcess
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<java.lang.Object>

Represents the process details of the rows in the ARO Data Collector task killer.

Sets the selected task killer row.

Parameters:
is - A boolean value that indicates whether or not the task killer row is selected.

getSelected

public boolean getSelected()
Returns a boolean value that indicates whether the current row of the task killer is selected or not.

Returns:
A boolean value that is "true" if the row is selected, and "false" if it is not.
